parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

parameter.name: isColorRgbFormat
parameter.description: Whether to use the 'foregroundColor' and 'backgroundColor' fields to write the calendar colors (RGB).

parameter.name: backgroundColor
parameter.description: The main color of the calendar in the format '#0088aa'.

parameter.name: colorId
parameter.description: An ID referring to an entry in the calendar section of the colors definition.

parameter.name: defaultReminders
parameter.description: A list of authenticated users for this calendar. Each item has method and minutes.

parameter.name: foregroundColor
parameter.description: The foreground color of the calendar in the format '#ffffff'.

parameter.name: isHidden
parameter.description: Whether the calendar has been hidden from the list.

parameter.name: notificationSettings
parameter.description: The method used to deliver the notification.

parameter.name: isSelected
parameter.description: Whether the calendar content shows up in the calendar UI

parameter.name: summaryOverride
parameter.description: The summary that the authenticated user has set for this calendar.
